'2':
The internet does not forget! 
 
Don't post photos, videos, or text that you or others may find uncomfortable. 
Once content has been circulated on the internet, it is almost impossible to remove!

'3':
Not everything on the internet is true! 
 
 Be suspicious of claims that you find on the net! Especially shocking or sensational news is often not true at all.
Sometimes rumors and false stories are purposely spread to deceive others.
'4':
There's nothing for free 
 
Anything stated free on the internet is always suspicious,
 Especially if they required your personal information.
Becareful it can be a malware.
'5':
Observe copyrights. 
 
 Always ask other peoples permission if you are publishing their content on the internet.

'6':

'7':
Take action against cyber bullying. 
 
 Cyber-bullying is never fun, but a criminal act. Defend yourself against cyber bullying and support victims of bullying: Secure evidence(screenshotsğŸ˜), block and report and get help from people you trust- the sooner the better.
'8':
Use apps safely. 
 
Only download apps from the official app shops - third-party apps are often infected with malware.âŒ
